statements.statement: with temp as( select TemplateID ,TemplateNO ,TemplateName ,TemplateDirection ,CreateDate ,row_number() over(order by CreateDate desc) as row from SWfsProductTemplate (nolock) where 1=1 #if($TemplateNO!='') and TemplateNO=@TemplateNO #end #if($TemplateName!='') and TemplateName like '%'+@TemplateName+'%' #end )select * from temp where row between (@pageIndex-1)*@pageSize+1 and @pageIndex*@pageSize
select count(0) from SWfsProductTemplate (nolock) where 1=1 #if($TemplateNO!='') and TemplateNO=@TemplateNO #end #if($TemplateName!='') and TemplateName like '%'+@TemplateName+'%' #end
select TemplateID ,TemplateNO ,TemplateName ,TemplateDirection ,CreateDate where TemplateNO=@TemplateNO
select TemplateCode from SWfsProductTemplate where TemplateNO=@TemplateNO
select count(0) from SWfsProductTemplate where TemplateNO=@TemplateNO
select TemplateID from SWfsProductTemplate where TemplateName=@TemplateName
delete SWfsProductTemplate where TemplateID=@TemplateID
select RefID ,ProductNO ,TemplateNO ,Status ,HTMLCode from SWfsProductRef (nolock) where ProductNO=@ProductNO
update SWfsProductRef set PublishHTML=HTMLCode,PublishHTMLMobile=HTMLCodeMobile,status=1,PublishTime=@PublishTime,PublishPeople=@PublishPeople where RefID=@RefID

with temp as ( SELECT a.ProductNO as ProductNo ,a.GoodsNo ,a.ProductName ,a.ProductPicFile ,a.IsShelf ,b.BrandCnName ,b.BrandEnName ,c.status as IsPublish ,d.TemplateName ,row_number() over(order by a.DateCreate desc) as row FROM [WfsProduct](nolock) as a left join WfsBrand (nolock) as b on b.BrandNo=a.BrandNo left join SWfsProductRef (nolock) as c on a.productNO=c.ProductNO left join SWfsProductTemplate (nolock) as d on d.TemplateNO=c.TemplateNO where 1=1 #if($Keyword!='') and (a.ProductName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or a.ProductNo =@KeyWord or a.GoodsNo =@KeyWord) #end #if($CategoryNo !='') and a.CategoryNo like '%' + @CategoryNo + '%' #end #if($Gender !='') and a.GenderStyle=@Gender #end #if($BrandNO !='') and a.BrandNO=@BrandNO #end #if($IsShelf!='') and a.IsShelf=@IsShelf #end #if($IsPublish!='') and c.Status=@IsPublish #end #if($TemplateName!='') and d.TemplateName like '%'+@TemplateName+'%' #end ) select * from temp where row between (@pageIndex-1)*@pageSize+1 and @pageIndex*@pageSize

select count(0) from WfsProduct (NOLOCK) as a left join WfsBrand (nolock) as b on b.BrandNo=a.BrandNo left join SWfsProductRef (nolock) as c on a.productNO=c.ProductNO left join SWfsProductTemplate (nolock) as d on d.TemplateNO=c.TemplateNO where 1=1 #if($Keyword!='') and (a.ProductName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or a.ProductNo =@KeyWord or a.GoodsNo =@KeyWord) #end #if($CategoryNo !='') and a.CategoryNo like '%' + @CategoryNo + '%' #end #if($Gender !='') and a.GenderStyle=@Gender #end #if($BrandNO !='') and a.BrandNO=@BrandNO #end #if($IsShelf!='') and a.IsShelf=@IsShelf #end #if($IsPublish!='') and c.Status=@IsPublish #end #if($TemplateName!='') and d.TemplateName like '%'+@TemplateName+'%' #end

with temp as ( SELECT p.ProductNo,p.GoodsNo,p.ProductName,p.BrandNo,brandCnName,brandEnName,p.CategoryNo FROM dbo.Product AS p INNER JOIN (SELECT productNo FROM SWfsProductComment WHERE 1=1 #if($Status !='') and x.Status=@Status #end #if($OrderNo !='') and x.OrderNo=@OrderNo #end #if($StarLevel!='') #if($StarLevel==1) and x.StarLevel=1 #end #if($StarLevel==2) and (x.StarLevel=2 or x.StarLevel=3) #end #if($StarLevel==3) and (x.StarLevel=4 or x.StarLevel=5) #end #end #if($IsResult!='') #if($IsResult=='reply') and x.CommentRContent!='' #end #if($IsResult=='noreply') and x.CommentRContent='' #end #if($IsResult=='result') and x.ResultCode!='' #end #if($IsResult=='noresult') and x.ResultCode='' #end #end #if($CommentKeyWord!='') and x.CommentContent like '%'+@CommentKeyWord+'%' #end #if($UserName!='') and (x.NickName like '%'+@UserName+'%' or u.NickName like '%'+@UserName+'%' or u.MailAddress like '%'+@UserName+'%') #end #if($StartTime!='') AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(50),x.DateCreate,23) >= CONVERT(VARCHAR(50),@StartTime,23) #end #if($EndTime!='') AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(50),x.DateCreate,23) <= CONVERT(VARCHAR(50),@EndTime,23) #end GROUP BY ProductNo) AS tempn ON p.ProductNo=tempn.ProductNo INNER JOIN dbo.SpBrand AS b ON p.BrandNo=b.BrandNo WHERE 1=1 #if($Keyword!='') and (a.ProductName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or a.ProductNo like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or a.ProductModel like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%') #end #if($CategoryNo !='') and a.CategoryNo like '%' + @CategoryNo + '%' #end #if($BrandNO !='') and d.BrandNO=@BrandNO #end ) SELECT * FROM temp WHERE row BETWEEN ( @pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 AND @pageIndex * @pageSize

SELECT count(0) FROM dbo.Product AS p INNER JOIN (SELECT productNo FROM SWfsProductComment GROUP BY ProductNo) AS tempn ON p.ProductNo=tempn.ProductNo INNER JOIN dbo.SpBrand AS b ON p.BrandNo=b.BrandNo WHERE 1=1 #if($Keyword!='') and (a.ProductName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or a.ProductNo like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or a.ProductModel like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%') #end #if($CategoryNo !='') and a.CategoryNo like '%' + @CategoryNo + '%' #end #if($BrandNO !='') and d.BrandNO=@BrandNO #end

SELECT count(0) FROM SWfsProductComment AS x INNER JOIN SpProduct a ON a.ProductNo = x.ProductNo --LEFT JOIN SpfSkuExtend AS b ( NOLOCK ) ON b.ProductNo = a.ProductNo --LEFT JOIN SpfSkuPrice AS c ( NOLOCK ) ON c.SkuNo = b.SkuNo --LEFT JOIN SpfProductExtend AS e ( NOLOCK ) ON e.ProductNo = a.ProductNo LEFT JOIN SpBrand AS d ( NOLOCK ) ON a.BrandNo = d.BrandNo LEFT JOIN sWfsUser AS u ON x.userId = u.UserId LEFT JOIN swfsaccount AS y ON y.UserId = u.UserId LEFT JOIN SWfsUserLevel AS ul ON ul.LevelNo = y.LevelNo WHERE 1 = 1 #if($Keyword!='') and (a.ProductName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or a.ProductNo like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or a.ProductModel like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%') #end #if($CategoryNo !='') and a.CategoryNo like '%' + @CategoryNo + '%' #end #if($Status !='') and x.Status=@Status #end #if($BrandNO !='') and d.BrandNO=@BrandNO #end #if($OrderNo !='') and x.OrderNo=@OrderNo #end #if($StarLevel!='') #if($StarLevel==1) and x.StarLevel=1 #end #if($StarLevel==2) and (x.StarLevel=2 or x.StarLevel=3) #end #if($StarLevel==3) and (x.StarLevel=4 or x.StarLevel=5) #end #end #if($IsResult!='') #if($IsResult=='reply') and x.CommentRContent!='' #end #if($IsResult=='noreply') and x.CommentRContent='' #end #if($IsResult=='result') and x.ResultCode!='' #end #if($IsResult=='noresult') and x.ResultCode='' #end #end #if($CommentKeyWord!='') and x.CommentContent like '%'+@CommentKeyWord+'%' #end #if($UserName!='') and (x.NickName like '%'+@UserName+'%' or u.NickName like '%'+@UserName+'%' or u.MailAddress like '%'+@UserName+'%') #end #if($StartTime!='') AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(50),x.DateCreate,23) >= CONVERT(VARCHAR(50),@StartTime,23) #end #if($EndTime!='') AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(50),x.DateCreate,23) <= CONVERT(VARCHAR(50),@EndTime,23) #end

WITH temp AS ( SELECT x.commentId , x.CommentContent , x.CommentRContent , x.datecreate , x.StarLevel , x.status , x.OrderNo , x.ResultCode , x.ResultDate , x.ResultNo , x.CommentType , x.CommentSource , x.NickName AS UserName , x.UserLevel , a.productName , a.productNo , a.ProductModel AS GoodsNo , e.ProductShowPic AS ProductPicFile , a.brandNo , d.brandEnName , u.nickname , u.MailAddress , ul.LevelName , ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY x.DateCreate DESC ) AS row FROM SWfsProductComment AS x INNER JOIN SpProduct a ON a.ProductNo = x.ProductNo --LEFT JOIN SpfSkuExtend AS b ( NOLOCK ) ON b.ProductNo = a.ProductNo --LEFT JOIN SpfSkuPrice AS c ( NOLOCK ) ON c.SkuNo = b.SkuNo LEFT JOIN SpfProductExtend AS e ( NOLOCK ) ON e.ProductNo = a.ProductNo LEFT JOIN SpBrand AS d ( NOLOCK ) ON a.BrandNo = d.BrandNo LEFT JOIN sWfsUser AS u ON x.userId = u.UserId LEFT JOIN swfsaccount AS y ON y.UserId = u.UserId LEFT JOIN SWfsUserLevel AS ul ON ul.LevelNo = y.LevelNo WHERE 1 = 1 #if($Keyword!='') and (a.ProductName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or a.ProductNo like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or a.ProductModel like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%') #end #if($CategoryNo !='') and a.CategoryNo like '%' + @CategoryNo + '%' #end #if($Status !='') and x.Status=@Status #end #if($BrandNO !='') and d.BrandNO=@BrandNO #end #if($OrderNo !='') and x.OrderNo=@OrderNo #end #if($StarLevel!='') #if($StarLevel==1) and x.StarLevel=1 #end #if($StarLevel==2) and (x.StarLevel=2 or x.StarLevel=3) #end #if($StarLevel==3) and (x.StarLevel=4 or x.StarLevel=5) #end #end #if($IsResult!='') #if($IsResult=='reply') and x.CommentRContent!='' #end #if($IsResult=='noreply') and x.CommentRContent='' #end #if($IsResult=='result') and x.ResultCode!='' #end #if($IsResult=='noresult') and x.ResultCode='' #end #end #if($CommentKeyWord!='') and x.CommentContent like '%'+@CommentKeyWord+'%' #end #if($UserName!='') and (x.NickName like '%'+@UserName+'%' or u.NickName like '%'+@UserName+'%' or u.MailAddress like '%'+@UserName+'%') #end #if($StartTime!='') AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(50),x.DateCreate,23) >= CONVERT(VARCHAR(50),@StartTime,23) #end #if($EndTime!='') AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(50),x.DateCreate,23) <= CONVERT(VARCHAR(50),@EndTime,23) #end ) SELECT * FROM temp WHERE row BETWEEN ( @pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 AND @pageIndex * @pageSize

select sku.SkuNo,brand.BrandEnName,product.CategoryNo, product.ProductName,extend.ProductShowPic ProductPicFile, sku.MarketPrice SellPrice,sku.SkuAttrTitle SkuAttrText, CONVERT(varchar(50), comment.DateCreate , 120) DateCreate,comment.CommentSource,comment.StarLevel,comment.Status, product.ProductNo ,comment.OrderNo from SpSku (NOLOCK) sku left join SWfsProductComment (NOLOCK) comment on comment.skuno=sku.skuno JOIN SpProduct(NOLOCK) product left join SpfProductExtend extend on extend.productno=product.productno left join SpBrand (nolock) as brand on product.BrandNo=brand.BrandNo ON sku.ProductNo=product.ProductNo where sku.skuno=@skuNo order by comment.DateCreate desc
select * from SWfsUserLevel
select * from SWfsProductComment where productNo=@productNo and orderNo=@orderNo and DateCreate=@DateCreate
select CommentPicId,PictureFileNo,CommentId,CreateDate,SortId from SWfsProductCommentPicRef(nolock) where CommentId = @CommentId order by SortId ASC
Update SWfsProductComment set CommentRContent=@CommentRContent where CommentId=@CommentId

with temp as ( SELECT qa.*,row_number() over(order by qa.DateQuest desc) as row FROM SWfsQuestAnswer AS qa where 1=1 #if($QuestKeywords !='') and qa.Quest like '%' + @QuestKeywords + '%' #end #if($AnswerKeywords !='') and qa.Answer like '%' + @AnswerKeywords + '%' #end #if($ProductKeywords!='') and qa.QuestAnswerId in ( SELECT QuestAnswerId From SWfsQuestAnswerRef where productNo in (select productNo From WfsProduct as p where p.ProductName like '%'+@ProductKeywords+ '%' or p.ProductNo =@ProductKeywords or p.GoodsNo =@ProductKeywords) UNION SELECT QuestAnswerId From SWfsQuestAnswerRef where categoryNo in (select categoryNo From WfsProduct as p where p.ProductName like '%'+@ProductKeywords+ '%' or p.ProductNo =@ProductKeywords or p.GoodsNo =@ProductKeywords) UNION SELECT QuestAnswerId From SWfsQuestAnswerRef where brandNo in (select brandNo From WfsProduct as p where p.ProductName like '%'+@ProductKeywords+ '%' or p.ProductNo =@ProductKeywords or p.GoodsNo =@ProductKeywords) ) #end
) select * from temp where row between (@pageIndex-1)*@pageSize+1 and @pageIndex*@pageSize

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT QA.QuestAnswerId) FROM SWfsQuestAnswer AS qa where 1=1 #if($QuestKeywords !='') and qa.Quest like '%' + @QuestKeywords + '%' #end #if($AnswerKeywords !='') and qa.Answer=@AnswerKeywords #end #if($ProductKeywords!='') and qa.QuestAnswerId in ( SELECT QuestAnswerId From SWfsQuestAnswerRef where productNo in (select productNo From WfsProduct as p where p.ProductName like '%'+@ProductKeywords+ '%' or p.ProductNo =@ProductKeywords or p.GoodsNo =@ProductKeywords) UNION SELECT QuestAnswerId From SWfsQuestAnswerRef where categoryNo in (select categoryNo From WfsProduct as p where p.ProductName like '%'+@ProductKeywords+ '%' or p.ProductNo =@ProductKeywords or p.GoodsNo =@ProductKeywords) UNION SELECT QuestAnswerId From SWfsQuestAnswerRef where brandNo in (select brandNo From WfsProduct as p where p.ProductName like '%'+@ProductKeywords+ '%' or p.ProductNo =@ProductKeywords or p.GoodsNo =@ProductKeywords) ) #end
SELECT * FROM SWfsQuestAnswer where QuestAnswerId=@QuestAnswerId
delete SWfsQuestAnswer where QuestAnswerId=@QuestAnswerId
delete SWfsQuestAnswerRef where QuestAnswerId=@QuestAnswerId
delete SWfsQuestAnswerRef where Id=@Id

select SpProduct.ProductNo ,SWfsQuestAnswerRef.id ,SWfsQuestAnswerRef.RefType ,SWfsQuestAnswerRef.QuestAnswerId ,SpProduct.ProductName ,SpCategory.CategoryName ,SpBrand.BrandCnName from SWfsQuestAnswerRef left join SpProduct on SpProduct.ProductNo=SWfsQuestAnswerRef.ProductNo left join SpCategory on SpCategory.CategoryNo=SWfsQuestAnswerRef.CategoryNo left join SpBrand on SpBrand.BrandNo=SWfsQuestAnswerRef.BrandNo

with temp as ( SELECT QuestAnswerId FROM dbo.SWfsQuestAnswerRef WHERE 1=1 AND ProductNo=@ProductNo AND brandNo=@BrandNo AND CategoryNo=@CategoryNo AND QuestAnswerId=@QuestAnswerId ) select * from temp

SELECT qar.questanswerId,qar.productNo,qar.categoryNo,qar.brandNo,p.productName,p.productNo,c.CategoryName,c.categoryNo,b.BrandCnName,b.brandNo,qar.RefType FROM dbo.SWfsQuestAnswerRef AS qar LEFT JOIN WfsProduct AS p ON qar.productNo=p.productNo LEFT JOIN WfsErpCategory AS c ON qar.categoryNo=c.categoryNo LEFT JOIN dbo.WfsBrand AS b ON qar.brandNo=b.brandNo WHERE qar.QuestAnswerId=@QuestAnswerId
$SQL
